item.title: Endless Grades Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Endless Grades is a mobile game that will perfectly fulfill the role of a good time-killer. In it, you need to assemble a team of heroes, and they will automatically fight monsters and bosses. For them to win, you need good equipment and Endless Grades codes will help you with this, as they will give you great rewards for free.

Updated August 6, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We have added several new codes with this update. Check back later if you want to redeem even more freebies.

All Endless Grades Codes

Below, you can find all active Endless Grades codes.

Active Codes

  • happyaugust - Enter this code to get some in-game freebies. (NEW)
  • HAPPYHALFYEAR - Enter this code to get some in-game freebies. (NEW)
  • HAPPYJULY - Enter this code to get some in-game freebies.
  • HAPPY74 - Enter this code to get some in-game freebies.
  • happyjune - Enter this code to get some in-game freebies.
  • HAPPYCHILDREN - Enter this code to get some in-game freebies.
  • happy100days - Enter this code to get some in-game freebies.
  • HAPPYMAY - Enter this code to get some in-game freebies.
  • HAPPYDISCORD - Enter this code to get some in-game freebies.
  • HAPPYSPRING - Enter this code to get some in-game freebies.
  • HAPPYMARCH - Enter this code to get some in-game freebies.
  • HAPPYGOOGLEPLAY - Enter this code to get some in-game freebies.
  • HAPPYPLAY - Enter this code to get some in-game freebies.
  • DISCORDCLUB - Enter this code to get some in-game freebies.

Expired Codes

At the moment, Endless Grades has no expired codes. We regularly update this page, so if any codes become inactive you will find them in this section.

Endless Grades: How to Redeem Codes

Codes are an important option in mobile games that allow players to receive free rewards. This increases the audience, so developers need to make it easy to redeem codes in games. Usually, different developers add the option to redeem codes in the same places, for example, in the profile menu. Thanks to that, gamers who enter the game for the first time immediately know what to do. However, those who are unfamiliar with such games may need help, so we have created a guide that will show you how to redeem codes in Endless Grades .

  • Launch Endless Grades .
  • After completing the tutorial, go to the Battle tab in the main menu.
  • Pay attention to the upper-left corner of the screen. There is a profile icon there. Press it to get to User Settings.
  • At the bottom of the screen, find and tap the Gift Codes button.
  • A window with a code field will appear. Paste the code from our list of active codes and hit Confirm to get the rewards. Unfortunately, the game will not show you what rewards you have received, but a message will appear stating that the code was redeemed successfully.

How to Get More Endless Grades Codes

If you want to receive information about new codes, you could visit the Endless Grades Facebook page. You can also join the official Discord server where you can not only find new codes but also chat with other players. However, the best way to get active codes is to bookmark this page in your browser, since we update it regularly.

Endless Grades is available on mobile.

item.title: Black Clover M Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Black Clover M is a spectacular game with interesting lore and gameplay that was inspired by the popular shonen anime, Black Clover . While playing the game, you will be immersed in the world of magic where you will meet many enemies and dangers, so you need to be ready for any challenge. To prepare yourself better, you can use Black Clover M codes to get valuable items and currency. These rewards will be a great boost for beginners who have just started their playthrough.

Updated August 6, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We are constantly updating this guide to bring you the most accurate and up-to-date information. Be sure to check back regularly for new codes and updates.

All Black Clover M Codes (Coupons)

The obstacles and enemies that await you are merciless, so you should find not only loyal friends but also resources to level up each of the characters. Black Clover M codes, also known as coupons, will help you with this, as they offer a whole range of useful rewards.

Codes Checked on August 6, 2024.

Active Codes

  • BCMS2GIFT1 - Redeem this code to get valuable gaming rewards
  • BCM777 - Redeem this code to get valuable gaming rewards

Expired Codes

  • GLOBALLAUNCHON1130
  • BCMXTAPTA
  • BCMGACHAGAMING
  • BCM1STLIVE
  • BCM2NDLIVE
  • QUIZBCM
  • DUNGEON

How to Redeem Codes in Black Clover M

In Black Clover M , as in most other similar games, you will need to go through a tutorial before you can redeem codes. It will take you about 20â€“30 minutes, but it will help you understand the game's mechanics and lore. Once you've done that, you'll eventually be able to redeem codes, which is a rather confusing process, so here's a quick guide to help you out:

  • When you complete the tutorial and the quest "Go to the entrance exam venue," you will be able to interact with your avatar.
  • It is located in the upper-left corner, so click on it to open a new menu.
  • Here, you will need to copy the AID, which is located in the upper left part of the menu, right below your nickname. Click the button right next to your AID to copy it.
  • Next, close the menu, and pay attention to the left side of the screen, there will be several icons in a column. Among them, find and interact with the one with the speaker to open the news menu.
  • When you open the menu, you'll see a list with buttons on the left that have different labels. Among them, find the one that says Coupon Redemption and interact with it.
  • Here, you will see a clickable link with blue text, click on it to go to the menu to redeem the code.
  • Here, you will need to fill in several input fields:
    • Account ID (AID) field - paste the copied AID here.
    • Redeem Code field - enter manually or copy and paste one of the codes mentioned above.

  • When you are done, click the Confirm button below.

Remember that each of these codes has a limited expiration date, so redeem them as soon as possible.

Black Clover M is now available on mobile devices.

item.title: Roblox: My Prison Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Beginning adventures in My Prison , players must build their prison almost from scratch by hiring workers, expanding the territory, constructing new buildings, and filling cells with new criminals. Eventually, everything, from communicating with everyone on your territory, to improving your car for transporting prisoners, will be your responsibility. Therefore, no matter your progress in Roblox My Prison , using reward codes can bring good freebies.

Unlike many similar games, My Prison does not reward players with ready-made buildings or exclusive personnel. Instead, you will receive a cash reward that you can invest in the desired improvements.

Updated August 6, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: This time, we added only one new code, but also checked all the old ones. Hurry and redeem them while they are still active.

All My Prison Codes

Although My Prison has offered Roblox players many good codes in the recent past, at the moment, you can only redeem a few to get 625 Cash.

Working My Prison Codes

  • YourHospitalReleased - Enter this code to get 350 Cash. (NEW)
  • SUMMER - Enter this code to get 350 Cash.

Expired My Prison Codes

  • 100M+ - Enter this code to get 875 Cash.
  • TouchPan - Enter this code to get 300 Cash.
  • Basketball - Enter this code to get 275 Cash.
  • Gate - Enter this code to get 350 Cash.
  • Basketball - Enter this code to get 275 Cash.

  • Christmasmonth - 300 Cash
  • calandarsoon - 300 Cash
  • passenger - 350 Cash

How to Redeem Codes in My Prison

The ability to redeem codes in My Prison is available to any player from the first seconds of gameplay, but finding the suitable tab the first time can be difficult. So, if you are a newbie, here is how you can redeem your codes:

  • Launch My Prison in Roblox .
  • Click on the Manage icon in the lower-right corner of the screen.
  • Go to the Rromocodes tab.
  • Enter the active code in the text field.
  • Click Redeem, after which you will receive your rewards.
  • If the code is no longer active, you will not receive any rewards, and a corresponding notification will appear at the top of the screen.

How to Get More My Prison Codes

Even though a few active codes are currently available to players, the My Prison developers do not plan to stop there. Any holiday or update, including the recent Basketball update, comes with codes. And if you want to know about everything before everyone else, you should visit the Discord channel of this game. In addition, developers @VincainRBX and @Florianne10Dev often share everything new on their X pages.

item.title: Roblox: Military Tycoon Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Military Tycoon Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Military Tycoon
  • How to Play Military Tycoon
  • The Best Roblox Tycoon Games Like Military Tycoon

In Military Tycoon , Roblox players must build their base, trying their best to attack and not be defeated. The game has plenty of exciting activities. For example, players can destroy bases of NPCs or even other Roblox players using a wide variety of vehicles to get valuable in-game resources. In this article, fans of the game will find Military Tycoon codes that they can redeem for all sorts of great in-game goodies.

Updated August 6, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Unfortunately, two codes have expired. There are currently no active codes. Check back later for more freebies.

All Military Tycoon Codes

All Working Military Tycoon Codes

How to Redeem Codes in Military Tycoon

Everything that players need to do to redeem codes in Roblox: Military Tycoon is mentioned below. Follow these steps to claim free rewards:

  1. Open Roblox and launch Military Tycoon.
  2. Look at the left-bottom side of the screen and find the Thumbs Up button. Press on it.
  3. In the pop-up menu, insert the code from this article and then click the REDEEM button.

Players should keep in mind that codes in Military Tycoon are time-limited, just like in many other Roblox games. With this in mind, they should try to redeem any active Military Tycoon codes as soon as possible.

How to Play Military Tycoon

Military Tycoon is a game where players must build a base, but there is also a lot of additional content. Base building is similar to other games of this genre, but at the same time, players also organize raids on other bases, complete missions to liberate and capture territories and build tanks, helicopters, and other equipment.

The Best Roblox Tycoon Games Like Military Tycoon

Tycoon is a popular genre that is really quite interesting, especially on the Roblox platform. If players want to find something similar but often stumble upon low-quality experiences, there's no need to worry. Below, they'll be able to find some of the best Roblox games like Military Tycoon :

  • Restaurant Tycoon 2

  • Anime Power Tycoon
  • Princess Castle Tycoon

item.title: Roblox: Ultimate Anime Simulator Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Ultimate Anime Simulator has a bunch of different codes, and here, we are going to tell you about the ones that are redeemable. With their help, you will get some cool rewards for free, and they can be quite useful in this fun Roblox game. So, here we will provide you with a list of all Ultimate Anime Simulator codes and explain to you how to redeem them.

Updated August 6, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: With this update, we added one new code. With that in mind, hurry to get a valuable freebie.

All Ultimate Anime Simulator Codes

Working Ultimate Anime Simulator Codes

  • Update140 â€“ Gives you 200 Gems (NEW)
  • Coin555 â€“ Gives you 2,500 Coins
  • Gem150 â€“ Gives you 200 Gems
  • Group110 â€“ Gives you 200 Gems
  • Discord200 â€“ Gives you 200 Gems
  • Char246 â€“ Gives you a Mythical Hero
  • Char321 â€“ Gives you a Legendary Hero
  • Char123 â€“ Gives you an Epic Hero

Expired Ultimate Anime Simulator Codes

  • Gem666
  • Gem600
  • Gem699
  • Update900

These codes provide you with various useful resources that you can use to progress in the game. With the help of Coins, you can get new characters and upgrade the ones you already have in your collection. This is a significant currency, and the more valuable your heroes are, the more Coins they require.

Gems can also be very useful, as they allow you to get new characters whenever you defeat them. Just make sure that you wonâ€™t waste them on things you donâ€™t need.

Finally, the codes that provide you with free characters are probably the most useful for a new player. They can give you powerful characters right at the beginning of your journey. So, you should redeem them as soon as possible.

How to Redeem Ultimate Anime Simulator Codes

As we have already mentioned already, you need to redeem Ultimate Anime Simulator codes to get your rewards. This process is similar to the one in other Roblox games, and here is how to do it. Follow these steps to get your rewards in Ultimate Anime Simulator :

  • Launch the Ultimate Anime Simulator game.
  • Once the game is launched, look at the buttons on the left side of your screen.
  • Search for the Twitter icon. It looks like a blue bird.
  • Click on the button with this icon, and a menu will appear.
  • Enter the code you want to redeem.
  • Receive your reward.

How to Get New Ultimate Anime Simulator Codes

We will update this guide with new Roblox codes as they become available. So, you can bookmark this article to check for these codes from time to time. Also, you can follow the official Ultimate Anime Simulator media:

  • Open RBX Group
  • Oper RBX Discord Server
